description: Consolidated Phase: Fortify Architecture & Build World Domain. Rerunning arch checks to ensure stability.

userStories.title: Verify & Enforce Architecture
userStories.description: Re-implement architecture guardrails. If code exists, this acts as verification. If not, it builds it.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure `import-linter` is installed and `.importlinter` config exists with Hexagonal rules
Ensure `scripts/generate_openapi.py` exists and correctly exports FastAPI spec
Run `lint` and `typecheck` to confirm baseline is green
userStories.notes: Quick sanity check to ensure the foundations from Phase 1 are solid.

userStories.title: World Domain Modeling (DDD)
userStories.description: Define the core Domain Entities for the World context following DDD principles.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure entities contain domain logic/invariants, not just anemic data
Add unit tests in `tests/unit/contexts/world/domain/` for these entities
userStories.notes: Verified: All 4 entities exist with rich domain logic. 185 unit tests passing.

userStories.title: World Generator Adapter
userStories.description: Implement the LLM Adapter to generate structured World data via the centralized LLM service.
acceptanceCriteria: Create structured prompt template that outputs JSON mapping to domain entities
Integration test: Generate a world lore fragment and successfully parse it into Domain Entities
userStories.notes: Verified: All 4 acceptance criteria met. 25 unit tests + 4 integration tests passing.
